sentences.sentence: Occasionally his behaviour became so uncontrollable that he had to be placed in a straitjacket.
sentences.translation: 有时他的行为会如此失控，以至他不得不被穿上一件约束衣。

sentences.sentence: One of the things that keeps the party in its straitjacket is the tea-party movement.
sentences.translation: 让共和党陷入这种困境的一个原因就是茶党运动。

sentences.sentence: The jury will have to be forced into an “intellectual straitjacket”, one law professor suggested.
sentences.translation: 一位法律教授说，陪审团将会陷入“左右为难的处境”。
